caption: Two decades ago, Tina Craig and a friend started the pioneering blog Bag Snob, followed by a beauty-focused spin-off. Her interests were aligned, Craig says: “Beauty and bags at department stores are always on the same floor. They don’t require sizing!” Her Chinese upbringing underscored the importance of good skin care, so it was fitting when Craig and her partners launched U Beauty in 2019. The brand’s patent-pending SIREN capsule technology enables next-level ingredient delivery, but her dreamed-up formulas are just as ingenious. When a new product is in development, she says, “I want my whole team obsessed.” Here, Craig brings exactly that enthusiasm to her well-edited BAG at violetgrey.com.
